summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 discussing logistics for a new alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein to attend a victim meeting in New York on October 23. Attorney Gloria Allred introduces her new client, and other recipients coordinate scheduling a call to discuss the arrangements.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.role: Attorney representing a new alleged victim
persons.context: She initiates the email chain, stating she has a new client who is a victim of Epstein and is willing to fly to New York for a victim meeting on October 23. She requests a call to discuss.

events.title: Planned Victim Meeting in New York
events.description: A victim meeting was scheduled to take place in New York. A new alleged victim, represented by Gloria Allred, was willing to fly there to attend.

events.title: Initial Disclosure of New Victim
events.description: Gloria Allred left a voicemail and sent an email disclosing she had a new client who was a victim of Epstein from the 1990s, willing to be interviewed.

locations: Los Angeles, CA 90048 (Allred, Maroko & Goldberg office at 6300 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 1500)
keyFacts: Attorney Gloria Allred had a new client in October 2019 who was an alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The alleged victim was from the 1990s and was willing to fly to New York for a victim meeting scheduled for October 23, 2019.
The email chain shows coordination among legal professionals to schedule a call (proposed for 5:45 PM) to discuss integrating this new victim into the meeting.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and legally privileged, indicating the sensitive nature of the victim's information.
